long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏀🌟 Basketball Legends is a slam-dunk of a sports game, letting you channel your inner basketball superstar! With its fast-paced, arcade-style gameplay and cartoonish graphics, it's a hit among fans of both basketball and casual sports games.

How to Play:
👟 Choose from a roster of legendary players.
🏀 Compete in high-intensity basketball matches.
💫 Enjoy dramatic dunks and moves with added flair.
📊 Utilize unique abilities and stats for each character.

Game Controls:
➡️ Arrow Keys: Move your player.
❌ X Key: Steal the ball (defense) / Shoot the ball (offense).
💨 Z Key: Dash (defense) / Spin move (offense).
🅛 L Key: Execute a powerful dunk (offense).

Get ready for some hoop action and showcase your skills on the virtual court! 🎮🔥

# Play others on the top-left menu.
